name: C_SECOND_ORDER
documentation: Abstract parent of classes defining second order constraints.

members.name: members
members.documentation: Members of this second order constrainer. Normally redefined in descendants.

c_conforms_to.name: c_conforms_to
c_conforms_to.documentation: True if constraints represented by this node, ignoring any sub-parts, are narrower or the same as other. Typically used during validation of specialised archetype nodes.

c_congruent_to.name: c_congruent_to
c_congruent_to.documentation: True if constraints represented by this node contain no further redefinitions with respect to the node other. Typically used to test if an inherited node locally contains any constraints.
